column4: hi you guys! I'm a newbie! And I need a little help. I've been using Xubuntu for just a few days, and that is the situation: I have to HDs and I'd like to know how to config Xubuntu do detect and mount my Slave HD automatically. Does anybody can help me? Thanks for the attention.
you have to format your extra hard disk if it hasn't got a filesystem yet. Then you need an entry for it in /etc/fstab
